abstract.p: Barnhart/CMI Marketing, Advertising and Public Relations partners Tim Abare, Chris Beatty, Scott Coe and Matt Neren are opening advertising agency to be called Workhorse Advertising in Boulder, Colo (S)

block.p: Four executives from Barnhart/ CMI Marketing, Advertising and Public Relations in Denver are opening an agency of their own, to be called Workhorse Advertising in Boulder, Colo.
The four partners are Tim Abare, 34; Chris Beatty, 34; Scott Coe, 35; and Matt Neren, 28.
Four executives from Barnhart/ CMI Marketing, Advertising and Public Relations in Denver are opening an agency of their own, to be called Workhorse Advertising in Boulder, Colo.
The four partners are Tim Abare, 34; Chris Beatty, 34; Scott Coe, 35; and Matt Neren, 28.
Mr. Abare, who is the senior copywriter at Barnhart/CMI, and Mr. Beatty, who is the senior art director there, will become co-creative directors.
Mr. Coe, who is the director for the high-technology group at Barnhart/ CMI, and Mr. Neren, who is the senior account manager there, will become co-account directors.
The new company's first client, with spending estimated at $1 million, will be ViaWest Internet Services.
